post.body: no news yet. I filed my complaint online and sent an e-mail to a friend from Apple's past. I am going to blog on this.
Forgot to thank you for the re-tweet last night. Thanks!
Landed at ORD only a couple hours laye
Just boarded, on the way back to sweet home Chicago!
En route to the airport in Denver, hoping to get to Chicago
On the ground in Denver
Boarded the plane ready to fly to DEN
I will miss Pownce. It was a good service while it lasted.
Driving in to work, I love snow
Bad service from Apple on Black Friday http://bazzoni.blogspot.com/ I had to blog about this so it doesn't happen to anyone else.
At Howl at the Moon in Chicago.
Morning all, still looking for a way to offer constructive criticism to Apple about my store/Juniper CC experience. Any ideas DM me.
Went home and bought online with the new Juniper card. They should have suggested that at the store.
Never thought I would get bad customer service from Apple
So I return it and not get the six month zero intrest. Would have bought online and not made two trips. They gave me bad info
Show up with the approval and the said they can't do it without the juniper card. Call them it will take 30 days. Have to pay Amex before
Juniper took an hour to process the new card So I was told to pay using my Amex and bring in the email and switch it to the juniper, no prob
It really is a complaint about the Juniper credit card and the way the store said one thing then another. no choices just empty promises
Anyone have the best way to level a complaint with Apple about this store?
In an even stranger turn of events I just returned my new MacBook, due to poor customer service at our Deer Park store. My wife is furious.
Just getting out of the UC, the Hawks WIN!
Tons of new Obama/Blagojevich info on http://obamamerica.blogspot.com/
I wish I never tried those Dr Dre Monster Beats headphones at Best Buy while I was in Denver. Damn display....
What a great day! Blago needed to go a long time ago. Hope he is a cell mate with OJ.
Lots of fun on http://obamamerica.blogspot.com/ today
